Layer.moveBehind

Function/Meaning
Move behind the specified layer
Type
Layer class method
Syntax
moveBehind(layer)
Arguments
layer Moves behind the layer specified here.
Only sibling layers (layers with the same parent) can be specified.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Moves behind the specified layer in the stacking order.
This method sets the Layer.absoluteOrderMode property to false.
